meanings.definition: The quality of being lively and animated.
meanings.sent1: Her vivaciousnesses lit up the room with her bright smile.
meanings.sent2: The children's vivaciousnesses were contagious as they played in the park.
meanings.sent3: The puppy's vivaciousnesses made even the grumpiest neighbor crack a smile.
meanings.sent4: The vivaciousnesses of the city never seemed to sleep, with lights and music filling the streets.
meanings.sent5: The vivaciousnesses of the dance troupe left the audience in awe of their energy and grace.

meanings.definition: The state of being full of energy and enthusiasm.
meanings.sent1: His vivaciousnesses for the project inspired the whole team to work harder.
meanings.sent2: The vivaciousnesses of the crowd at the concert made the singer feel appreciated.
meanings.sent3: Even on a Monday morning, her vivaciousnesses for life were unmatched.
meanings.sent4: The vivaciousnesses of the ocean waves crashing against the shore were a sight to behold.
meanings.sent5: The vivaciousnesses of the marathon runners pushed them to the finish line with determination.
